name: google_docs_extract_content
description: Extract content from a Google Docs document including text, structure, and metadata

includeFormatting.description: Whether to include text formatting information

maxBlocks.description: Maximum number of content blocks to extract

toolInfo.emb: Google Docs document content extraction tool
toolInfo.thought: Manually copying content from Google Docs loses structure and formatting. This tool extracts structured content including headings, paragraphs, and metadata in one operation.
